T02D2697:63b-1: tri sa ma ya by'u ha r'a dza sha ta aaksha ra s'a dha nam /
T02D2697:63b-3: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge brgya pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2697:63b-4: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2697:63b-6: mngon mtho dngos grub kun 'byung gnas //
T02D2697:63b-7: sngon bsags sdig ba dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2697:63b-8: bla mar gyur pa kun la 'dud //
T02D2697:63b-9: de la dang po rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2697:63b-10: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing //
T02D2697:63b-11: bla ma mnyes byas rjes gnang thob //
T02D2697:63b-12: man ngag ji bzhin rnyed pa dang /
T02D2697:63b-13: 'jig rten chos dag rnam par spangs //
T02D2697:63b-14: sems can kun la snying brtse ba //
T02D2697:63b-15: rtag tu bsgom dang bzlas la dga'//
T02D2697:63b-16: de ni rgyal bas rnal 'byor gsungs //
T02D2697:63b-17: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam //
T02D2697:63b-18: dur khrod nags tshal mchod rten drung //
T02D2697:63b-19: me tog 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis brgyan //
T02D2697:63b-20: aa sho ka yi shing drung du //
T02D2697:63b-21: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa 'grub //
T02D2697:63b-22: yon tan kun tshad rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2697:64a-3: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te //
T02D2697:64a-4: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po yi //
T02D2697:64a-5: sngags kyis bgegs rnams gzhom par bya //
T02D2697:64a-6: na ma: sa manta k'a ya w'a ka tsi tta
T02D2697:64a-7: badz'a na nat krit h'um dza sha / de nas
T02D2697:64a-8: cha gsum la go rims bzhin du sngags bzlas nas
T02D2697:64a-9: lus kyi cha gsum bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D2697:64a-13: rigs kyi snying po legs bzlas shing /
T02D2697:64a-14: gsar zhing ma grugs ku sha yi //
T02D2697:64a-15: dag byed sor ni bcu gnyis chad //
T02D2697:64a-16: srin lag la ni gdags par bya //
T02D2697:64a-17: aom aa dzi na dzi ka / dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang //
T02D2697:64a-18: ba yi zho dang pa mar dang //
T02D2697:64a-19: ba yi chu dang lci ba rnams //
T02D2697:64a-20: shar ba ltas mi smra tsog tsog por //
T02D2697:64a-21: 'dug ste sbyar la srang gsum tsam //
T02D2697:64a-22: pa l'a sha yi 'dab mas btung //
T02D2697:64a-23: aom b'a ka bi shuddha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:64a-24: de nas chu dogs su phyin la lus thams cad dam yang na yan lag lnga bkrus te /
T02D2697:64a-26: g-yas pa'i khyor bas chu bcus te /
T02D2697:64a-27: g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub bsgrengs la /
T02D2697:64a-28: aom du pi k'a ya du pi du pi sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:64a-29: zhes bzlas pas lus la gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2697:64a-30: lus thams cad 'khru ba'i sngags ni /
T02D2697:64a-31: aom pra kri ti pa ri shuddha: sarba dharm'a: phra kri ti pa ri shuddho ny\ham /
T02D2697:64a-32: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa'i
T02D2697:64a-33: mthe bo bsgrengs nas mdzub mo bkug pas snying ga
T02D2697:64a-34: dang / lkog ma dang spyi gtsug dang dpung pa
T02D2697:64a-35: gnyis te gnas lngar gtug cing khro bo gtsang sme
T02D2697:64a-36: med pa'i sngags kyis bdag nyid bsrung ste /
T02D2697:64a-37: aom badzra kro dha h'um dza: / lag pa g-yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag bkug ste /
T02D2697:64a-38: aom shuddhe ntu sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:64a-39: de nas sems ma yengs par bsam gtan gyi khang par song ste /
T02D2697:64a-40: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po
T02D2697:64a-41: 'og nas 'chad pa bzhin 'khor dang bcas pa mdun
T02D2697:64a-42: gyi nam mkha' la dmigs te /
T02D2697:64a-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da banda nam ka ro mi zhes pas zhabs la phyag bya'o //
T02D2697:64a-44: aom pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha ra sa sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:64a-45: zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul ba dang /
T02D2697:64a-46: ji ltar rnyed pa'i mchod pa lnga'am /
T02D2697:64a-47: ma rnyed na yang yid kyi sa sprul nas /
T02D2697:64a-51: aom badzra nee bi dye h'um /
T02D2697:64b-0: @64b aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um zhes bas go
T02D2697:64b-1: rims ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa dbul ba
T02D2697:64b-2: dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2697:64b-3: dbang med bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang /
T02D2697:64b-4: bgyid du stsal lam rjes su yi rang gang //
T02D2697:64b-5: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gis ni //
T02D2697:64b-6: spyan sngar da lta ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D2697:64b-7: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang //
T02D2697:64b-8: rgya cher 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
T02D2697:64b-9: sgrub pa mdzad dad de las gzhan pa la'ang //
T02D2697:64b-10: bdag ni gus par rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2697:64b-11: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing //
T02D2697:64b-12: blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02D2697:64b-13: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2697:64b-14: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2697:64b-15: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra pa ste //
T02D2697:64b-16: dman pa 'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02D2697:64b-17: srid pa'i rnal 'byor zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2697:64b-18: 'dod chags la sogs sprul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02D2697:64b-19: blo ldan rnam rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i //
T02D2697:64b-20: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2697:64b-21: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2697:64b-22: zhes brjod cing de bzhin du byang chub sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2697:64b-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir bskul ba dang /
T02D2697:64b-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bas de ltar tshogs bsags
T02D2697:64b-26: nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba thams cad stong pa
T02D2697:64b-28: de brtan par byed pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D2697:64b-29: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba ddharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhony\ham /
T02D2697:64b-30: de nas stong pa'i dang las mi ljang gu las
T02D2697:64b-31: byung ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba dang
T02D2697:64b-32: ze'u 'brul mam gyis mtshan pa dang bcas pa bsams
T02D2697:64b-33: la / de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2697:64b-34: 'khor de'i steng du treem las byung ba'i bcom ldan
T02D2697:64b-35: 'das dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po sku mdog
T02D2697:64b-37: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2697:64b-38: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus spras pa /
T02D2697:64b-39: chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya can du bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02D2697:64b-40: de'i g-yas phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin ston ka'i 'dam bu ltar ser skya /
T02D2697:64b-41: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2697:65a-0: @65a * // phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung nas snying gar thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D2697:65a-1: g-yon du byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin chen
T02D2697:65a-2: po sku mdog ser po g-yas na nor bu bzang
T02D2697:65a-3: po bsnams pa / mchan khung g-yon pas dung ngam rdo rje bzung ba /
T02D2697:65a-4: rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa'o //
T02D2697:65a-5: g-yas kyi mdun rol du khye'u mtha' yas khro bo'i cha byad can /
T02D2697:65a-6: sku mdog me tog pa l'a sha lta bu g-yas
T02D2697:65a-7: na shan pa'i zangs gri / g-yon na ka p'a
T02D2697:65a-8: la me tog gi tshogs kyis bkang ba /
T02D2697:65a-9: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2697:65a-10: sprul dkar po'i mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba'o //
T02D2697:65a-11: g-yon gyi mdun rol du bu mo mtha' yas zhi
T02D2697:65a-12: ba'i cha byad can sku mdog d'ur ba'i myu gu
T02D2697:65a-13: lta bu g-yas pa'i thal mos rang gi gtso bo
T02D2697:65a-15: g-yon pas padma yu ba dang bcas pa bsnams pa /
T02D2697:65a-16: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D2697:65a-17: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i steng dus
T02D2697:65a-18: bon gyi yi ge treem las 'od zer kha dog
T02D2697:65a-19: lnga pa shin tu gsal ba spros pas bcom ldan
T02D2697:65a-20: 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la
T02D2697:65a-21: spyan drangs te / mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul
T02D2697:65a-22: nas de'i spyan sngar 'khor ba thog ma med pa
T02D2697:65a-23: nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa'i tshogs dag par bya ba'i
T02D2697:65a-24: phyir lha'i sku sgyu ma lta bu de nyid la
T02D2697:65a-26: bzlas brjod byed pa mi myur mi dal zhing //
T02D2697:65a-27: ha cang che min ha cang chung ba'ang min //
T02D2697:65a-28: smra bzhin ma yin gzhan du yengs bzhin min //
T02D2697:65a-29: gug skyed klad kor tsheg drag nyams pas min //
T02D2697:65a-30: 'phags pa'i yi ge brgya pa yi //
T02D2697:65a-31: rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho gar bshad //
T02D2697:65a-32: sngags kyi mthu ni bsam mi khyab //
T02D2697:65a-33: mthu ni rnam pa du ma mthong //
T02D2697:65a-34: bzang spyod yi dam bcas pa yi //
T02D2697:65a-35: cho ga yis ni 'di bzlas na //
T02D2697:65a-36: thar pa'ang nges par skyed byed na //
T02D2697:65a-37: 'chi ba slu ba smos ci dgos //
T02D2697:65a-38: aom na mastree ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D2697:65a-39: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D2697:65a-40: sarba tra aa bra ti ha ta pabti dharma t'a ba li n'am /
T02D2697:65a-41: aom aa sa ma sa ma /
T02D2697:65a-42: sa manta to aan nta tr'a pa pte sh'a sa ni ha ra ha ra /
T02D2697:65a-43: smar smar na bi ga ta r'a ga ta r'a ga / buddha dharma te /
T02D2697:65a-48: ga ga na ma h'a ba ra la ksha ne
T02D2697:65a-49: dzva la dzva la na s'a ga re sva h'a
T02D2697:65b-0: @65b aom bam badzra dha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:65b-1: aom mam ma h'a badzra dha rodbha ba sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:65b-2: aom tam ta ki ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:65b-3: aom nam na ndi ka ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2697:65b-5: 'di'i cho ga ni yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad rgyu
T02D2697:65b-6: skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i bzhag nas brtsis te
T02D2697:65b-7: / rang nyid khrus dang bsrung ba la sogs pa sngar smos pa bzhin byas la /
T02D2697:65b-8: tsandan dkar po'i chus nye bar byugs pa'i mandal byas
T02D2697:65b-9: nas 'dod pa'i lha grangs dang mnyam pa'i me tog
T02D2697:65b-10: gi tshom bu legs par bkod nas /
T02D2697:65b-11: dang por bsnyen pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2697:65b-12: de'i 'og tu ni las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2697:65b-13: de nas yang gtso bo la 'bum bzlas shing 'khor
T02D2697:65b-14: rnams la khri bzlas par bya zhes bsam gtan gyi
T02D2697:65b-16: de nas las la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2697:65b-17: lus kyi kun tu spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D2697:65b-18: pas gzhan mi smra bar rgyu skar rgyal gyi zhag
T02D2697:65b-19: la dka' thub la gnas te /
T02D2697:65b-20: gtsang sbra'i spyod pas shing mya ngan med kyi drung
T02D2697:65b-21: du gdong gyen du phyogs pas stong phrag bcu gnyis
T02D2697:65b-22: bzlas na las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed pa zad
T02D2697:65b-23: par 'gyur ro // 'chi kar cho ga 'di nyid
T02D2697:65b-24: bzlas na bcom ldan 'das rje btsun nyid mdun du
T02D2697:65b-25: byon nas zhal mngon sum du ston par 'gyur ro
T02D2697:65b-26: par 'gyur ro // // kun tu spyod pa gtsang
T02D2697:65b-27: mas mchod rten gyi drung du spos dkar po bsregs
T02D2697:65b-28: nas mi smra bar stong phrag bcu bzlas nas /
T02D2697:65b-29: ral gri dang rkang mgyogs dang /
T02D2697:65b-30: ri lu dang gnod sbyin mo dang /
T02D2697:65b-31: lha ma yin gyi phug dang /
T02D2697:65b-34: mi snang ba rnams grub po //
T02D2697:65b-35: chu klung gi nang du mgrin pa man chad nub
T02D2697:65b-36: par zhugs nas gza' phur bu'i zhag la stong phrag
T02D2697:65b-37: nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas na sa 'og dang sa
T02D2697:65b-38: steng dang sa bla gsum las rnam par rgyal bar
T02D2697:65b-39: 'gyur ro // sngar smos pa ltar bsnyen pa byas te /
T02D2697:65b-40: phyis sgrub pa'i dus su 'byung po'i nyin zhag gi
T02D2697:65b-41: nam phyed na bdud rtsi lnga la spangs pa'i padma'i
T02D2697:65b-42: skud pa las snying po byas la /
T02D2697:65b-43: chu srin gyi zhag gis bkang ba'i thod par mar me spar bar bya'o //
T02D2697:65b-44: de nas thod pa gsum gyi sgyid po'i steng du btsugs nas /
T02D2697:65b-45: de nas thod pa'i steng na gnas pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2697:65b-46: pos sngar smos pa'i cho gas bsrung bar bya ste
T02D2697:65b-47: / gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2697:66a-0: de nas du ba blangs te za ma tog tu legs par @66a * //
T02D2697:66a-1: bzhag nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pas rgya gram du bcings te /
T02D2697:66a-2: yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na dngos grub gsum 'grub bar 'gyur te /
T02D2697:66a-3: de yang mi snang ba ni mchog go / sa'i
T02D2697:66a-4: 'og na gnas pa'i gter mthong ba ni 'bring ngo
T02D2697:66a-5: // rgyal po'i bu mo dbang du byed pa ni tha ma'o //
T02D2697:66a-6: de dag kyang rang gi mig la bsku ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2697:66a-7: snga ma ltar bsnyen pa byas la bhr'um las byung
T02D2697:66a-8: pa'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'i steng du
T02D2697:66a-9: dug gis zin pa bzhag la /
T02D2697:66a-10: dug gi gzi brjid ser po rnams kyis ma lus
T02D2697:66a-11: pa khyab pa la 'khor lo dkar po nyid kyi
T02D2697:66a-13: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'od zer dkar po
T02D2697:66a-14: gsal bar bsam pa ni dug bsal ba'i cho ga'o
T02D2697:66a-15: // dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba la stong phrag brgyad bzlas te /
T02D2697:66a-16: dar sngon pos gtums nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pas
T02D2697:66a-17: bcings nas mchod rten chen po'i srog shing la btags
T02D2697:66a-18: nas ji srid ma grol ba de srid du ser
T02D2697:66a-20: bag zan dang tsandan dmar po'i phye ma la klu'i rgyal po ba ru na'i gzungs brnyan byas te /
T02D2697:66a-21: nim pa'i khu bas byugs la dus gsum du 'bras
T02D2697:66a-22: chan dang 'o ma dang 'bras bu gsum gyi gtor
T02D2697:66a-23: ma gtod bzhin pas gtso bo'i sngags kyi sv'a h'a
T02D2697:66a-24: / gong du aom n'a ga r'a dza ba ru
T02D2697:66a-25: na ye sh'i ghram munydza ba ri sha ya da
T02D2697:66a-26: ttam sv'a h'a zhes zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin
T02D2697:66a-27: re stong phrag bcu bzlas nas gzugs brnyan klu'i mtshor
T02D2697:66a-29: bcom ldan 'das nyid la phul ba'i me tog rnying
T02D2697:66a-30: pa gar mkhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i mes kham
T02D2697:66a-31: phor sar pa bkang ba'i nang du bsregs nas bla
T02D2697:66a-32: gab med par brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na char 'chad
T02D2697:66a-33: par 'gyur ro // gro ga'am chu shing gi 'dab ma la sngags gur gum gyis bris te /
T02D2697:66a-34: skar ma me bzhi la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
T02D2697:66a-35: mgul du btags na byis pa chung du bsrung bar
T02D2697:66a-36: 'gyur ro // rma bya'i sgo'am thing ril gyi rkang
T02D2697:66a-37: la lan stong phrag gsum bzlas nas sgo khang gi
T02D2697:66a-38: rta babs sam sgo steng du btsugs nas /
T02D2697:66a-39: de'i 'og nas 'dzul ba'i srog chags thams cad la yams kyi nad kyis mi tshugs so //
T02D2697:66a-40: las tshogs gzhan dag 'dir gzhung mngas kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
T02D2697:66b-0: las de thams cad sems @66b can thams cad la brtse ba ni kha skong gi man ngag go //
T02D2697:66b-1: rtog pa'i rgyal po la brten nas //
T02D2697:66b-2: bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02D2697:66b-3: go rims ji bzhin bris pa las //
T02D2697:66b-4: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs /
T02D2697:66b-5: sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni //
T02D2697:66b-6: sngags 'di yis ni las rnams kun //
T02D2697:66b-7: brtson ldan the tshom med pa yis //
T02D2697:66b-9: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge brgya
T02D2697:66b-10: ba sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po ke dha
T02D2697:66b-11: ra na dhis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2697:66b-13: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta dpal go mi 'chi med dang /
